meeting_info.organization: Government Performance and Financial Management Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Briefing Room, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the December 12, 2024 Government Performance and Financial Management Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: The Economics of Land Use in Dallas County Created for MetroTex Realtors
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the economic implications of land use in Dallas County.

agenda_items.title: Consideration of Legislative Priorities: Casino, Gambling, and Game Rooms
agenda_items.description: Discussion on legislative priorities regarding casinos and gambling.

agenda_items.title: Procurement Solicitation and Evaluation Process
agenda_items.description: Overview of the procurement solicitation and evaluation process.

agenda_items.title: Texas Proposition 2, Property Exemption for Child-Care Facilities
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the implications of Texas Proposition 2.

agenda_items.title: Reallocation of Funds from the American Rescue Plan Act (ARPA)
agenda_items.description: Discussion on reallocating funds from ARPA.

agenda_items.title: Attestations for Construction Procurements Greater than $50 Million
agenda_items.description: Discussion on attestations required for large construction procurements.

agenda_items.title: DFW International Airport FY 2024 Debt Management Plan
agenda_items.description: Overview of the debt management plan for DFW International Airport.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Items for January 24, 2024
agenda_items.description: Discussion on upcoming agenda items related to general obligation bonds.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Items for January 24, 2024
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the selection of an underwriting pool for future bond financings.

agenda_items.title: Community Development Block Grant (CDBG) Timely Expenditure of Funds
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the timely expenditure of CDBG funds.

agenda_items.title: GPFM Two-Month Forecast
agenda_items.description: Presentation of the two-month forecast for the Government Performance and Financial Management.

agenda_items.title: Budget Accountability Report Information as of November 30, 2023
agenda_items.description: Presentation of the budget accountability report.

agenda_items.title: Technology Accountability Report Information as of December 31, 2023
agenda_items.description: Presentation of the technology accountability report.

agenda_items.title: Office of the City Auditor Monthly Update on Internal Audit Reports Released
agenda_items.description: Update on internal audit reports released between December 1, 2023 and January 12, 2024.
